org.cast.cwm.xml.service
Class XmlService

java.lang.Object
  org.cast.cwm.xml.service.XmlService

public class XmlService
extends Object

Service class to load XML documents, set up and request XSL transforms, manage caching and updating from the filesystem, etc.

Field Detail

documents

protected Map<String,XmlDocument> documents
Keeps track of all XmlDocuments in the system, hashed by their name. This allows XmlDocument objects to be accessed without serializing and keeping copies of them.

transformers

protected Map<String,IDOMTransformer> transformers
Tracks all known transformers, by name.

xmlSectionClass

protected Class<? extends XmlSection> xmlSectionClass
Class of XmlSection object that will be created by all methods in this module.

updateCheckInterval

protected int updateCheckInterval
Wait at least this many seconds between checks of files for updates.

domCache

protected DomCache domCache
Cache for DOMs generated by transforming XML.

namespaceContext

protected NamespaceContext namespaceContext

loadXmlDocument

public XmlDocument loadXmlDocument(String name,
                                   org.apache.wicket.util.file.File file,
                                   XmlParser parser,
                                   List<IDocumentObserver> observers)
Load an XML document from a File and register it by name with this object.

Parameters:
name - name for this XML document (must be globally unique)
file - the file that contains the XML text
parser - the XML parser to be used
observers - (optional) list of initial document observers
Returns:
the loaded and registered XmlDocument
See Also:
#loadXmlDocument(String, Resource)}

loadXmlDocument

public XmlDocument loadXmlDocument(String name,
                                   org.apache.wicket.Resource xmlResource,
                                   XmlParser parser,
                                   List<IDocumentObserver> observers)
Read an XML document from the given Resource. It will be remembered by this service class and can thereafter be referred to by the given name.

Parameters:
name - name for this XML document (must be globally unique)
xmlResource - Resource from which to read the XML content
parser - the XML parser to be used
observers - (optional) list of initial document observers
Returns:
the XmlDocument

                                XmlDocument document)

document -

loadXSLTransformer

public IDOMTransformer loadXSLTransformer(String name,
                                          org.apache.wicket.util.file.File xslFile,
                                          boolean forceUniqueWicketIds,
                                          org.apache.wicket.util.file.File... dependentFiles)
Create and load a transformer based on the given XSL File. If second argument is true, then a secondary transformation will be chained on, which makes sure that all wicket:id attributes (likely created by the XSL) are made unique.

Parameters:
name -
xslFile -
forceUniqueWicketIds -
Returns:
the transformer

loadXSLTransformer

public IDOMTransformer loadXSLTransformer(String name,
                                          org.apache.wicket.Resource xslResource,
                                          boolean forceUniqueWicketIds,
                                          org.apache.wicket.Resource... dependentResources)
Create and load a transformer based on the given Resource, which should point to an XSL document. If second argument is true, then a secondary transformation will be chained on, which makes sure that all wicket:ids created by the XSL are made unique.

Parameters:
name -
xslResource -
forceUniqueWicketIds -
Returns:
the transformer

registerTransformer

public void registerTransformer(String name,
                                IDOMTransformer transformer)
Register the provided DOM Transformer under the name provided.

getTransformed

public TransformResult getTransformed(ICacheableModel<? extends IXmlPointer> mXmlPtr,
                                      String transformName,
                                      TransformParameters params)
Get transformed version of given XML, either from cache or by executing transform. You can optionally specify parameters that are considered part of the cache key.

Parameters:
sec -
transformName -
Returns:
the transformed DOM Element.

serialize

public String serialize(Element res)
Parameters:
res -
Returns:
This will return a string of the elements children. Can be used to get the html content from a child/children.

getWicketNodes

public NodeList getWicketNodes(Element elt,
                               boolean all)
Finds wicket nodes for a given element. This method either returns all of the wicket nodes (up and down the DOM) or the first layer of wicket nodes immediately below the provided element.

Parameters:
elt - the element to search
all - true, if searching the entire tree. false, if just searching for the first wicket children.
Returns:

setInstance
